edu.umn.biomedicus.acronym

Class WordVectorSpace

  • edu.umn.biomedicus.acronym.WordVectorSpace

  • public class WordVectorSpace

    A vector space used to calculate word vectors from context. Keeps a dictionary and frequency statistics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordVectorSpace()
      Default constructor, uses maximum distance of 9.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildIdf()
      This needs to be called after all training vectors have been passed. It sets up the IDF for each term and will save cycles at test time by stopping counting for the IDF

      boolean getCountingDocuments() 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getDictionary() 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getDocumentsPerTerm() 
      SparseVector getIdf() 
      double getMaxDist() 
      long getTotalDocs() 
      java.lang.Integer removeWord()
      For de-identification purposes: remove a single word from the dictionary
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> removeWordsExcept()
      For de-identification: remove all words except those in a given set

        public void buildIdf()

        This needs to be called after all training vectors have been passed. It sets up the IDF for each term and will save cycles at test time by stopping counting for the IDF

      • removeWord

        public java.lang.Integer removeWord()

        For de-identification purposes: remove a single word from the dictionary

        Returns:
        the integer index of the word removed (null if it was not present)

      • removeWordsExcept

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> removeWordsExcept()

        For de-identification: remove all words except those in a given set

        Returns:
        a Set of integers corresponding to the words removed
